mutants.code:
import math

def highest_common_factor(arr):
    num1 = arr[1]
    num2 = arr[1]
    hcf = math.gcd(num1, num2)
    for i in range(2, len(arr)):
        hcf = math.gcd(hcf, arr[i])
    return hcf

import math

def highest_common_factor(arr):
    num1 = arr[-1]
    num2 = arr[1]
    hcf = math.gcd(num1, num2)
    for i in range(2, len(arr)):
        hcf = math.gcd(hcf, arr[i])
    return hcf

import math

def highest_common_factor(arr):
    num1 = arr[0]
    num2 = arr[1]
    hcf = math.gcd(num1, num2)
    for i in range(-2, len(arr)):
        hcf = math.gcd(hcf, arr[i])
    return hcf
